meaning: ▶ inherent rights 생득권 ▶ Love is inherent in a good marriage. 사랑은 행복한 결혼 생활에 내재해 있다.inherent·ly▷ inhére v.; inhérence, inhérency
details:
in·her·ent〔inhí∂rənt, -hér-〕 a. 고유의, 본래부터의, 타고난
▶ inherent rights 생득권
▶ Love is inherent in a good marriage. 사랑은 행복한 결혼 생활에 내재해 있다.
inherent·ly ad.
▷ inhére v.; inhérence, inhérency n.
